analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions for the Dhammas, the First Section of the Chapter on the Triads

original: 21.26. Hetuduka, Sekkhattika🔽Nahetuṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nahetuṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nahetuṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati🔽hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevasekkhanāsekkho
analyzed: hetu duka sekkhattika  na hetum na sekkham dhammam paccayā hetu sekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na hetum na asekkham dhammam paccayā hetu asekkhaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na hetum na nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paṭicca na hetu nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ dhammo uppajjati  hetu paccayā na na hetum na nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paṭicca na hetu nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
